2.27.23  10:30 pm   How do you know when you overthink something?  

     I've never felt rewarded for self-reflection, and I feel like every artist that emphasizes self-reflection never gains anything from it either.  Whether that's because they don't learn from it or because they feel the need to overanalyze themselves because they think its what makes them important.

2.25.23  10:20 pm   I feel like the world is advancing so quickly that it's unwise to trust that things will be similar 50 years from now, and to base life decisions off of that information. so like I'm in college because if I was 60 today I would need to have a retirement plan and stuff to provide for my family, and a college degree in today's world seems to provide that. but staying in college just doesn't make any sense to me since the systems in place when I will be 60 are gonna be so different to the ones today.. does this sound rational to you?
